title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Jhumka Earrings
features: Contemporary interpretation of the classic jhumka design. Features a floral motif of clustered brilliant-cut diamonds leading to a vibrant pear-shaped emerald drop. Secure stud closure for comfortable wear.
colors: and lush green emeralds. A sophisticated color palette perfect for both traditional and modern outfits.
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to everyday wear. Pairs beautifully with silk sarees or contemporary gowns.
description: A modern twist on the timeless jhumka. The emeralds represent prosperity and new beginnings, making this a meaningful and beautiful gift. Crafted with ethically sourced diamonds and emeralds, ensuring lasting quality and brilliance.
